resources.string: The one-time code was rejected by the server. It may have expired. Try generating a new code. Also, make sure you have the latest version of this app.
This one-time code is not valid. Try scanning the code again. Also, make sure that you have the latest version of this app.
An unexpected error occurred while authenticating. Try again. If the issue persists, make sure you have the latest version of this app.
There was an error contacting the server. Please ensure you have Internet connectivity, then try again.
I\'m daft, what is this even?
Welcome! This seems to be your first time using this app. Please have your one-time code ready to scan.
